title: Can I Vote?
description: When Leo goes to the community center with his parents, he learns that they are going to vote for president and other people in government. Leo is disappointed that he isn't old enough to vote, until he sees that there is a voting booth for kids! This story will introduce students to voting and help them get involved in the election process.
meta: candidates, election, government, president, registration, responsibility
Use the reading strategy of visualizing to understand text
Syllable Patterns : Understand and use syllable patterns to divide words

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
